abstract: When I look back at my time in the airforce, it might have been only 16 months but it was an incredibly important time in my life.
description: Noel Williamson joined the RAAF because he wanted adventure and he wanted to serve. While his limited education kept him grounded, he speaks fondly of his time in the RAAF, and the opportunities that he grasped with both hands once the war ended.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001839; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Indigenous veterans]; Active; 2010
